Html:
Hi everybody.

 

I'm facing a bit of a pickle, mostly because I'm new to GMap.NET.

I have a GIS spatial database in Sql Server, with all the data I need (region shapes, roads, etc.) and instead of using a map provider as google maps or bing maps, I am trying to find a way to render a map using this data (like Sql Server Management Studio is able to do in the "Spatial Results" tab), so I can build a WPF or Windows Forms app on top.

I'd really appreciate some help.

 

Best regards,

Pedro.
you need manually create routes/polygons from your data

Thanks for the reply.

I ended up using a server (Geoserver) linked to the Sql Server database to retrieve the data and render images.

Works like a charm.

 

Best regards, and thanks for all the hard work,

Pedro.
